metadata.title: CVE-2023-20861 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Spring Framework versions 6.0.0 - 6.0.6, 5.3.0 - 5.3.25, 5.2.0.RELEASE -5.2.22.RELEASE, and older unsupported versions, it is possible for a userto provide a specially crafted SpEL expression that may cause adenial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
